pages.title: Getting Started With Create
pages.text: In TerraFirmaGreg, TFC's own mechanical power system has been replaced with $(thing)Create$().$(br2)You can make a few Create things once you have Wrought Iron, but you can only really get started once you have access to $(l:mechanics/steel)Steel$() and $(thing)Steam Machines$().$(br2)First, you will need a source of $(thing)Mechanical Power$(), either Water Wheels, Windmills, or a Steam Engine. Of these, $(thing)Water Wheels$() are the easiest to start with, just put them in a river!$(br)

To move mechanical power around, you will need $(thing)Cogwheels$().$(br)To make these, first put some $(l:mechanics/mechanical_power)Creosote$() and any $(thing)Wooden Planks$() in a $(l:mechanics/barrels)Sealed Barrel$().$(br)This will give you $(thing)Creosote-Treated Wood Planks$().

pages.title: Treated Wood Pulp
pages.text: Next, put those treated planks in a $(thing)Steam Macerator$(). This will produce $(thing)Treated Wood Pulp$().

pages.title: Treated Wood Plank
pages.text: Lastly, putting the pulp into a $(thing)Steam Compressor$() will produce a $(thing)Treated Wood Plank$().$(br2)You can then use these to craft $(item)Cogwheels$()!
